sections.summary: teacher's aide who has lovingly taught 8 children, ages 0 through 18 months. thorough in guiding children through a variety of daily activities and making sure the curriculum is age-appropriate and fun. dependable and reliable worked others shifts when they couldn't make it to work. highlights basic clerical knowledge charting and recordkeeping reliable and punctual child abuse prevention friendly understands developmental disorders cheerful and energetic active listener teamwork oriented first aid certificate housekeeping
